Package com.gsm.controller

Class OrderBOMController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.controller.OrderBOMController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/order-boms")
public class OrderBOMController
extends java.lang.Object
    OrderBOMController Handles all web requests related to the Order Bill of Materials (BOM). This includes displaying the BOM list, showing the creation/edit form, and saving data.

    • Method Detail

      • showOrderBomList

        @GetMapping
@PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_Admin\') or hasAuthority(\'BOM_VIEW\')")
public java.lang.String showOrderBomList​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Displays the list of all Order BOMs.
        Parameters:
        model - The Spring Model to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        The name of the Order BOM list view template.

      • showOrderBomForm

        @GetMapping("/form")
@PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_Admin\') or hasAuthority(\'BOM_VIEW\')")
public java.lang.String showOrderBomForm​(@RequestParam
                                         java.lang.Long saleOrderId,
                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Displays the Order BOM form for a specific Sale Order. It will find an existing BOM or create a new one if it doesn't exist. It also prepares all necessary data for dropdowns and serializes details to JSON for the frontend.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderId - The ID of the Sale Order to create/edit the BOM for.
        model - The Spring Model to pass data to the view.
        request - The HttpServletRequest to access the CSRF token.
        Returns:
        The name of the Order BOM form view template.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there is an error serializing the details list to JSON.

      • saveOrderBom

        @PostMapping("/save")
@PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_Admin\') or hasAuthority(\'BOM_VIEW\')")
public java.lang.String saveOrderBom​(@ModelAttribute
                                     OrderBOMDto orderBOMDto,
                                     org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Handles the submission of the Order BOM form.
        Parameters:
        orderBOMDto - The DTO containing the form data.
        redirectAttributes - Used to pass success or error messages after a redirect.
        Returns:
        A redirect command to the Sale Order form.
